casebody.data:
No. 09-1343. J. McIntyre Machinery, Ltd., Petitioner v. Robert Nicastro, et ux. 562 U.S. 1198, 131 S. Ct. 1061,

178 L. Ed. 2d 861,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 999. January 24, 2011.

Motion of respondent Robert Nicastro, the authorized representative of the Estate of Roseanne Nicastro, to be substituted as party for Roseanne Nicastro granted.
